Biscuits

üñ®Ô∏è PDF

Ingredients

  • 240 grams all-purpose flour
  • 180 grams buttermilk
  • 100 grams lard or shortening
  • 1 tablespoon baking powder
  • 1‚ÅÑ2 teaspoon kosher salt

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 450¬∞F.
  2. Sift flour, baking powder, and salt.
  3. Cut in lard with a fork.
  4. Add the milk, mixing with a fork, until the mixture comes together.
  5. Roll 2‚ÅÑ3" thick and cut with a biscuit cutter or mason jar ring (you'll get about 6).
  6. Bake for about 10 minutes.
